title: Megan Fox shares sweet Disneyland Halloween photos of her kids with Brian Austin Green
text:
CLOSE Megan Fox is proudly a mommy of three now as she had her third son Journey in August. Fans had yet to see the newborn until Wednesday when Fox posted a picture to Instagram of her lying next to Journey. USA TODAY

Megan Fox and husband Brian Austin Green shared a rare Halloween treat this weekend.

The family was in Disneyland and decked out for the holiday, and Fox, 33, actually managed to get some photos of all three kids: Noah, 7, Bodhi, 5, and Journey, 3.

Of course, she had the usual mom lament. She posted several photos to Instagram, along with the caption, "Halloween at @disneyland is always the most fun but can I get ONE family photo where everyone is looking at the camera and making a semi normal face ??"

In the first photo, the actress and her sons pose in front of a Ferris wheel, with red dragon Journey obviously more interested in something else.

Want your Halloween horror-filled or Not-So-Scary? Pick your poison at Disney or Universal

More: Megan Fox is raising a confident son who 'loves' wearing dresses, doesn't care what others say

The other two photos show the family a little more put together, with Journey in Dad's arms and Mom in her flower-decked mouse ears. Noah is wearing an awesome witch costume complete with hot-pink wig. Bodhi's costume might be a skeleton (?).

Green, 46, wore the tried-and-true father costume: jeans and a black tee.

description: Megan Fox and husband Brian Austin Green shared a rare Halloween treat this weekend: photos of their three kids, Noah, 7, Bodhi, 5, and Journey, 3.
